<The Yankee Girl
1:
--------------------
Text: The Yankee Girl:  This film though a comedy is actually based on Ring's 1910 musical-comedy play of the same name.
Triplets:<The Yankee Girl
2:
--------------------
Text: The Yankee Girl:  Being a silent film of course Ring's singing could not be heard by the film audiences but they would get the rare chance of seeing this Broadway star in a film as many could not afford to make the journey to New York to see her in person in the play.
Triplets:<The Yankee Girl
